roleset.name: make a bubbling noise
roleset.note: GURGLING-V NOTES: Based on stratified data. Comparison to gurgle.01. Fits with VN class manner_speaking-37.3 and sound_emission-43.2. Framed by Katie. (from gurgling.01-v)

example.name: with an inanimate arg 0
example.text: He sat, listening to the brook gurgling over the rocks.
